Description:
Live Amongst The Moonah Trees
The property has met reserve. The Openn Negotiation (auction held online with flexible terms for qualified buyers) is underway and the property can sell as early as tomorrow. Contact Peta ph 0439 354 362 or Levi ph 0408 552 539 immediately to become qualified and avoid missing out.
The Feel:
Live in close connection to nature, with north living & a wall of glass bifold doors framing the views of your very own Moonah forest in the shady backyard. The forest walking trail is only steps away, offering handy proximity to the river, beach & Village Parklands. Multi-faceted decks invite outdoor living, while inside under high ceilings, this large family home boasts the versatility of a spacious kitchen & meals area, 2 living areas, 4 bedrooms plus a dedicated home office or study.
The Facts:
-Large 4 BR home plus study on 892sqm approx. with versatile indoor/outdoor living
-Entire north side of bifold doors with phantom fly screens, opens onto deck
-Very private aspect, fully fenced with side gate access for trailer or storage
-Spacious Master with raked ceiling, en suite, WIR, ceiling fan & TV point
-3 more carpeted bedrooms with BIRs, most with ceiling fans
-Tassie Oak floors throughout, with 2 generous family living areas
-Open plan living & adjacent meals area with large kitchen, quality appliances & walk-in pantry
-SSAC in main living, plus ceiling fans & gas ducted heating provide year-round comfort
-Central bathroom with toilet, shower, freestanding bath & double vanity
-DLUG with workshop bench & storage, garden shed & compost zone
-Coastal setting in desirable street with no-thru traffic
-Walk to the to the Village Park, Beach, Barwon Heads Primary & Hitchcock Avenue
The Owner Loves.
Saratoga Avenue is a very friendly street. Our family have enjoyed our time here. With so much space and privacy and the luxury of daily walks through the Coastal Moonah Forrest.

Description:
Easy Living In Immaculately Presented Coastal Home
The Feel:
Designed to embrace the very essence of coastal living, this distinctive 3-bedroom home exudes the relaxed vibes of Barwon Heads. Stunning window treatments, soaring pitched ceilings & wraparound covered decks create a seamless connection to nature, with truly enviable landscaped outdoor spaces & a self-contained studio that boasts private access. Inside, the fresh, earthy colour palette & textural elements offer a calm aesthetic, with dual living areas providing functional zoning for family life.
The Facts:
-Open plan living, kitchen, dining with north outlook to covered wraparound deck
-Light-filled soaring 3.5m pitched ceiling with v-groove panel feature walls
-Central kitchen w/ brand new Caesarstone benchtops, s/s Bosch & Miele apps & ample storage
-Main living zone anchored by Jindara woodfire heater & French doors to the deck
-Convenient SSAC & ceiling fans to both living rooms, + zoned ducted heating
-Single track floor to ceiling linen drapes in both living rooms add style & grace
-Versatile 2nd living space/rumpus room with Tassie Oak wall divider to study nook
-Master retreat with WIR, en suite, ceiling fan & direct access to deck
-2 more well-proportioned bedrooms, each with its own character
-Both bathrooms feature underfloor heating & stone benchtops with champagne Meir tapware
-Floating timber laminate flooring (Luxury Vinyl Plank with lifetime warranty) + quality wool carpets
-Stunning gardens and lawns on 707sqm (approx).
-Double oversized RC garage w/ internal access, & side gate access to yard for trailer/boat
-Other notable features include: new Rheem hot water system, freshly painted inside & out, outdoor hot/cold shower, exposed aggregate concrete driveway & courtyard
-Separate studio with en suite, pitched ceiling, feature wall, French doors to north lawn
-Just minutes to school, shops, river & beach via Village Parklands opposite this home
Owner Loves.
We love that we can all have our own space, yet come together in the centre of the home. There are so many places to sit & relax, from your morning coffee looking to the parklands, to late afternoon drinks on the west deck.

Description:
High on the Ridge
This amazing North back and titled block is one to take note. Perfectly position high on the ridge and swimming in northern light and views or Mount Dunned and Freshwater Creek. Boasting a huge 4000sqm of space and lifestyle options. You will have the world at your fingertips when designing your dream home / lifestyle. Room for a large home, swimming pool and tennis court, this property is of premium size and premium location.
View for yourself, you will not be disappointed.

Description:
The Perfect Package On Parkview!
Situated on a large 677m2 allotment in a quiet court here is a wonderful opportunity to secure a very tidy three bedroom home with some very appealing extra features which separate it "from the pack". The dual concrete paved driveways, cavernous covered outdoor living area, stylish kitchen renovation and rumpus/bungalow at the rear of the property all combine to make the perfect house for those who seek some style with practicality. 
From the street view the newly constructed high wooden fence gives instant appeal and privacy to the property. With dual access points and driveways on both sides, storing a trailer, caravan or boat a breeze without imposing on your day to day car access needs.
Walk into the home to discover three well sized bedrooms with built in robes and split system in the master. New carpet throughout pleases the eye immediately. The spacious living is at the rear of the house adjacent to the stylishly renovated kitchen and dining area. Polished concrete floors and subway kitchen wall tiles define this area with a very contemporary touch. Plenty of cupboard space and a dishwasher feature in the kitchen. A gas wall heater in the living and cooling unit in the dining cater for all temperatures. Step outside to a truly magnificent covered outdoor living area. Entertaining will be a treat in this vast space and the stone filled extended yard ensures the property is an attractive but low maintenance affair. A bungalow/rumpus on the northern rear side will make the perfect hobby/gym or storage room. A split system also adorns this room. Behind this is even more storage space with a garden shed.
With Hansen Reserve immediately next door and Grovedale Recreation Reserve only a short stroll away taking the kids for a play in the park and dog for a walk is no problem. With quick access onto Torquay Rd the Surf Coast is only a short drive away while all amenities are all catered for with nearby Heyers Rd Shops and to a larger extent at Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre. The current owners are also happy to stay on as tenants for any interested investor. Hurry to get the perfect package!
Insights: 2 Parkview Court, Grovedale VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 143 other 3 bedroom house in Grovedale have recently been sold.

Description:
Peaceful and private, in a convenient location.
OPEN FOR INSPECTION CANCELLED
On offer here in a convenient pocket of Grovedale is this perfectly sized unit with an uncommonly spacious backyard for this style of property. The fantastic location will have you within a stone's throw from your choice of local essentials, including the Peter Street Shops, Heyers Road IGA and public transport all walking distance.
Occupying the rear of a 3-unit complex, this property is both secluded from the road, and offer the largest back yard in the complex. On entry, a light-filled and spacious living area flows through to an open plan kitchen and dining area. The kitchen features a gas cooktop, oven dishwasher, and ample storage.
Two large bedrooms both offer floor-to-ceiling built-in robes and are serviced by a central bathroom with separate toilet.
Outside, the spacious and private back yard offers plenty of space for a BBQ area and veggie patch and is perfect for those who wish to build an alfresco area (STCA)
Notable features include:
Split System in the living room
Laundry with access to the backyard and good storage
Single lock up garage with door to the backyard
Space for a second vehicle in front of the garage
Located within walking distance to public transport and the local shops, just 5 minutes to the Waurn Ponds Shopping Mecca and 15 minutes to the Geelong CBD, this property is sure to be popular! Don't miss out, contact us to arrange your private inspection.

Description:
Blue-chip Old Highton, New Build
Set high upon the hill in one of Highton's most desirable pockets, there's nothing left to do in this magnificent newly built home.
Leave your worries at the front door and feel the overwhelming sense of calm created by the perfect balance of contemporary quality and detailed features.
GROUND LEVEL
Your sumptuous master suite is cleverly located at the front of the home, well away from the other bedrooms upstairs - just perfect for those with teenage kids or older. You'll love the large WIR, but it's the in-floor heating of your dual vanity ensuite that will become something you simply can't live without!
Head down the hall and on your right you'll find a powder room, multiple linen closets and a great sized laundry with even more storage. To your left, one of the three living spaces; this one complete with gaslog fire. Continue on through to the incredible open-plan living at the rear and see where the magic really happens! Stone benchtops, shaker style cabinetry, dual ovens and a butler's pantry make the kitchen a dream to work in and provide a perfect vantage point over the adjacent dining and living. Sunlight fills this north-facing room beautifully, while stacker doors extend the space onto the alfresco and flat backyard. Entertaining and family were clearly at the forefront of the design of this home.
UPPER LEVEL
Head upstairs and you'll find a large family room which is perfect breakout space for the kids. Three additional bedrooms all have BIR and share a central bathroom with not just a separate toilet, but a full powder room - ensuring guests don't have to brave going into the kids' bathroom!
If you're feeling uncertain about the market, answer this - do you want to buy your dream home while there are less people looking or when everyone else is buying again!?
A reminder that private inspections are strictly by appointment only, just give David a call to organise yours.
Insights: 26 Pepperdine Way, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 108 other 4 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
Sturdy, Strong & Spacious!
Nestled on a generous 647m2 corner allotment in this fantastic Highton location sits this well maintained and very neat home ready for the astute buyer to make their own. Perfectly positioned close to quality Schools, Highton Village, Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Leisurelink Aquatic Centre, Deakin University, Epworth Hospital and the M1 taking you to Melbourne in under an hour.
Neat as a pin and well maintained, this much loved family home consists of four spacious bedrooms, a study and two internal living areas. The two separate living zones will be perfect for kids needing to make as much noise as they want at one end of the house while parents can have their own private retreat at the other. The kitchen has a dishwasher, cupboard space aplenty and pantry. Ducted heating, a split system and gas wall heater take care of all temperature needs internally. A north facing backyard with covered outdoor living and rear vehicle/trailer access optimise the corner block. The double lock up garage with mezzanine storage space within is a great feature and internal access from here is a rarity for a house of this era. Concrete stumps under the floor will comfort buyers. All in all here is a solid home with loads of potential, offering a great opportunity for someone wanting to buy in a great part of Highton. Book your private inspection today!

Description:
FANTASTIC BUYING IN WOMBAH PARK!!
Aesthetically pleasing, deceivingly spacious and superbly presented best describes this fabulous residence that will appeal to retirees looking to downsize, holiday makers looking for a great location or savvy investors. Situated in Wombah Park' and close to public transport, the Lochard Drive convenience store and a short stroll to Whites Beach. The property comprises 3 bedrooms with built in robes, master with en-suite and separate family bathroom, two living areas, one formal lounge plus a large open plan kitchen, dining and living area facing north providing plenty of sunshine and natural light, a private paved courtyard surrounded by beautiful landscaped gardens and grassed area flows from the main living zone. Spacious laundry with access to the single remote garage which boasts glass sliding doors providing direct access to the rear yard. Featuring dual blinds to bedroom two and three, ceiling fan to master, double glazed windows to all bedrooms and split system heating and cooling.
With a quality property close to amenities and beach becoming increasingly harder to secure, this may be the ideal opportunity to lock in this fantastic property, call today to book your private inspection.

Description:
SECLUDED LIFESTYLE GEM
PLEASE CONTACT US TO REGISTER FOR OPEN INSPECTIONS
Following a recent breathtaking renovation the quality and sophistication of this property truly induces a real feeling of homeliness. Set on 5.16ha (approx.) this captivating family homestead represents a genuine lifestyle opportunity within the coveted and in-demand Bellbrae district. Soak up the ambience of the thoughtfully revived interior, where an instantly appealing façade is introduced by native gardens all giving way to outstanding zoned living areas of the highest standards.
The art of distinction radiates with northern light and airy spaces and engineered timber floors creating warmth to the separated family living zones. The thoughtfully appointed kitchen is the central hub of the home and opens fully to the outdoors where north facing bespoke bi-fold doors open to an opulent alfresco zone and the in-ground lap pool. Accommodation is zoned over two levels and includes a generous study, family bathroom, whilst offering 3 bedrooms including a second level master with luxe ensuite, dressing room & private balcony with superb rural views.
The lifestyle begins through a timber gated entrance where the tree lined drive provides access to all a horse lover desires - multiple stables, horse manage, track room, hot wash area and horse pen all serviced by 2x20,000l water tanks. Including a garage, workshop and under cover area the ambience of this property is enhanced by stunning sun sets and sunrises as the wildlife enjoy entertaining themselves in the surrounding dams and the natural billabong.
Other comprehensive appointments include three heating options (Gas, electric & wood fire), air conditioning, integrated 5 tank watering system that provides up to 100,000l (approx.) to the entire property, an established orchard with nectarines, plum, pear, apple and apricot tress. Including a short stay cabin that offers 2 BRs, living and dining area, with log fire, and a separate bathroom, this is an income producing option.
Just a short drive to Torquay and Jan Jucs world class beaches, restaurants and shopping village and not far from Deakin University, The Epworth hospital and the Waurn Ponds shopping precinct - this is an opportunity to good to refuse.
Insights: 290 Gundrys Road, Bellbrae VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 1 other 5 bedroom house in Bellbrae have recently been sold.

Description:
Create a LIFESTYLE, not an address
Grossmans Ridge, the perfect blend of rural settings and coastal lifestyle. Nestled in a rural and idyllic stretch of elevated countryside only minutes from world-class beaches, Torquays town centre and the Great Ocean Road. A place where families create their long-held dreams, where a house surrounded by open space and natural beauty becomes not just a home but also a lifestyle. With large vacant allotments ranging from 2935sqm - 4035sqm you will have space to design your perfect property to include, swimming pool, tennis court, veggie patch, sports equipment and more. The best part is that all of Torquays outstanding schools, shops, sporting facilities and pristine beaches are so close by.
Blue skies, fresh air and your new healthy lifestyle are waiting.

Private Appointment Welcome

Description:
When Only The Best Will Do
Stunningly appointed throughout, this contemporary family home strikes a balance between luxury living, homely comforts and all the space your family needs. The lower level boasts a private living area or teenage retreat and large guest bedroom which is serviced by a two way ensuite. The striking staircase leads to seamless open plan living with spotted gum flooring, ceiling to floor windows that capture gorgeous natural light and a welcoming family area with authentic log fire place and balcony with views to the hills and beyond. The entertainers kitchen is the heart of the home, fully equipped with quality appliances, WIP and oversized island bench. Just beyond lies a spacious meals area and expansive indoor/outdoor deck. With everything you need for a memorable family get together, the deck offers a full outdoor kitchen with built in BBQ, wine fridge, sink and heating and cooling options for all year round entertainment. The remaining accommodation is also located on the first level with indulgent master suite offering deluxe bedroom finishes, WIR, ensuite and private views. A separate family wing services three further bedrooms all with robes, a large main bathroom with spa bath and a separate powder room. To complete the home is a large family laundry and storage galore downstairs with not one but two added storage rooms. Not to be outdone this property also offers a great private backyard for the kids, secure zoned alarm system, refrigerated cooling, 5 zone ducted heating, ducted vacuum, surround sound system and the icing on the cake an impressive 6 car garage with internal access.
Insights: 41 Esperence Crescent, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 29 other 5 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
Live The Dream
Private Inspections - By Appointment Only
Peacefully tucked away down a sweeping driveway, this quality Mark Gleeson built home is a resort like hideaway. Surrounded by 1.5 acres (approx) of easy care native gardens, this home sits nestled into its complementary landscape.
Designed to harness the north facing aspect, the extensive living areas are an absolute highlight. They are zoned to maximise comfort and liveability, and include a cosy family area; a generous open plan space with casual dining and wood fire; and an adjacent formal dining room. This is the ideal home for entertaining guests. The extensive kitchen, fully enclosed all weather outdoor living and heated in ground pool, make it all so effortless to share this treasure with family and friends.
The master suite is king sized, and with a reading corner, generous walk-in robe, gorgeous garden outlook and en-suite, it is an inviting retreat. Two additional bedrooms are clustered around a family sized bathroom with a separate bath and shower. While a guest bedroom and large study (or fifth bedroom) are cleverly situated to provide privacy for all.
Other features include an insulated store/cellar; hydronic heating; an oversized double garage offering workshop and storage space; 67,000 litre capacity rainwater tanks and 9kw solar power.
Spacious, contemporary and almost self-sufficient, this property feels a million miles away from the busyness, yet it is just minutes to the beach, schools and shops. This is the ultimate escape that combines the best of town, country and coast in an idyllic and tranquil spot.
Insights: 304 Grossmans Road, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 24 other 5 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
Family living in Prime Grovedale location
On offer is a fantastic family residence situated in a prime Grovedale location. Ideally located within walking distance to Mandama and Nazareth Primary School and just a stone's throw away from the Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Deakin University, Epworth Hospital with easy access to the Ring Road and Surf Coast Highway.
This Fantastic family home offers 4 bedrooms, master with large walk in robe and ensuite. 3 bedrooms, 2 with built in robes that are zoned to the rear of the home along with main bathroom and laundry.
The first large formal living area flows nicely into the open plan kitchen lounge and dining. Sliding door access from the lounge will lead you to a huge undercover area where you can enjoy entertaining year round. There is an abundance of room outside.
Features of the home include, ducted heating, 1 x S/S units, ceiling fans, dishwasher, an abundance of storage, double lock up garage, side access into the back yard, plenty of off street parking and undercover entertainment area.
Such a fantastic family home which is ideally located lends itself to so much potential. Suiting a range of buyers from first home buyers, investors, or families wanting extra space this property won't last long. Move straight in and enjoy or update and turn into your dream home. The choice is yours -Inspect ASAP.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
COASTAL HOME IN GREAT POSITION!!
This coastal family home positioned on a huge 665m2 (approx.) allotment is situated in a quiet court location and within walking distance to Whites beach and flying fox playground. Ideal first up permanent home, holiday retreat or rock-solid investment property with many future development opportunities (S.T.C.A).
Upon entry you are greeted with a spacious living room and formal dining area which wraps around to an updated and well-equipped kitchen/meals zone. Accommodation consists of 3 good sized bedrooms with built in robes, renovated centrally located family bathroom, laundry and double carport with access to the enormous rear yard.
Other features include: bamboo flooring, gas heating, split system cooling, shedding at rear, private low maintenance gardens with plenty of room for a boat or trailer. With the beach at your doorstep and all other facilities a short walk away this could be the coastal lifestyle you have been looking for, call today for further information.

Description:
EFFORTLESS COASTAL LIVING
With a magnificent street presence, this beautifully presented two storey Le Maistre built home seamlessly blends bright contemporary spaces with several indoor/ outdoor entertaining areas for all the family to enjoy. Graced with light filled spaces and tranquil surrounds, this residence is located bordering the second fairway of the popular Sands golf course and is situated in a quiet cul-de-sac only a short walk from the club house, beach, reserves, parks and schools.
Downstairs boasts a wide hallway with two bedrooms both with built in robes plus a guest bedroom or home office that are serviced by a central main bathroom, separate laundry and large living area that opens out to the low maintenance gardens.
Upstairs is the showcase of the home with Tasmanian oak floorboards and panoramic views of the golf course and surrounding water ways from the expansive glass windows. Open plan living is high on the agenda on this level with the kitchen complete with stone island bench the centrepiece of this room combined with the meals/ living zones and outdoor entertaining area. The master bedroom is also located on this floor and has a walk-in robe and ensuite plus there is a separate powder room for family and guests.
Features include internal access to double garage with follow through door, split system heating/ cooling, gas log fire, ceiling fans, rainwater tank and low maintenance living at its best.

Description:
Stylish Highton living.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Julia on 0432 182 271.
Please check our Head Office guidelines below before meeting with one of our agents or before viewing a property by appointment.
Visit: https://www.barryplant.com.au/cms/document/view/118/COVID-19_Online_Information_v2.pdf for more information.
ONLINE AUCTION 14th May 2020 6:30pm.
$500,000 - $550,000
To register your interest or to arrange an inspection, please call the listing agent.
Sitting on a generous 870m2 approx. block this fully renovated home is awaiting its lucky new owner.
Updated from head to toe, just painted, new carpet and newly renovated bathroom are just a few of the reasons to love 13 Huntly Close. This home is not only move-in-ready but still allows for future value to be added with ample space to extend (STCA). Upon entry you will be greeted by timber flooring and light filled living. The open plan floorplan flows seamlessly from living, kitchen and dining. The backyard is the focal point from the kitchen/dining, making it ideal for supervising the kids or just enjoying the peaceful garden surrounds.
The ground level hosting bedrooms 1 & 2 and the two-way renovated bathroom. Upstairs hosting the large second living space with pitched roof, endless natural light and third bedroom.
Stepping outside to the decked outdoor entertaining space, then onto the large secure backyard surrounded by established trees and lush green grass. Just minutes to Highton primary, Christian College, Bellaire Primary and Deakin University. Just minutes to Highton village shopping, Waurn Ponds shopping mecca that hosts Bunnings, Coles, Aldi, Reading cinemas, restaurants/retail and Leisurelink aquatic center. Also within 5 minutes to Epworth hospital, Waurn Ponds Train station and 10 minutes to the Geelong CBD.
Key features:
-870m2 block
-Updated throughout
-New carpet, paint and bathroom
-Heating & cooling -reverse cycle ducted heating & air conditioning (electric)
-Quiet location, established gardens
-Two living zones
-Open plan, timber flooring, natural light throughout
-Minutes to Highton primary, Christian College, Highton Village, Waurn Ponds shopping, Deakin Uni & The Epworth Hospital
-Rental return approx. $400-$420 per week
For more information please call Julia Warren anytime on 0432 182 271.

Description:
The block you've been looking for.
With gorgeous views toward the You Yangs, this extensive allotment is the ideal parcel to build your dream home on. Situated in a premier location in the Highview Estate. This 769m² block provides immense building options for the lucky buyer, surrounded by architecturally designed homes this location is certainly highly regarded.
Conveniently located only a short drive from the Barrabool Hills Plaza and the community of The Highton Village with superb cafes and restaurants to enjoy at your pleasure. A selection of quality schools in the precinct, including Montpellier and Highton Primary, close vicinity to Deakin University plus excellent sporting reserves and recreational parks. With access to the Ring Road made ever so easy you can drive to Melbourne or cruise down to the world famous surf coast and embrace the magnificent Great Ocean Road.

Description:
All about location.
An A1 lifestyle opportunity within walking distance to Porter Avenue Shops and the Highton Village, this is a combination that is hard to beat. Ideal for those seeking a range of services including Bellaire Primary, Belmont High and public transport within close proximity. Consisting of three bedrooms with built in robes, spacious living, kitchen and meals area on a generous fully landscaped allotment including alfresco entertaining, single carport and single lock up garage. Features include air conditioning split system, gas heater, garden shed and north facing sunroom. Ease of day to day living is assured being with easy reach of Waurn Ponds Shopping, the Aquatic Centre, Ring Road, Deakin University and Epworth Hospital. Outstanding value is present for first home buyers or investors alike. Book your private inspection now.
